nodes.text: Yeager's Secret (French: Le Secret de Yeager) is the fourth and final installment in the Star Wars Resistance chapter books series, a series of French language junior novels written by Vanessa Rubio-Barreau that adapt episodes of Star Wars Resistance Season One. Yeager's Secret was published by Hachette Jeunesse on June 9, 2019 and adapts the Star Wars Resistance episode "Fuel for the Fire".

Through his new friend Jace Rucklin, Kaz learns that Yeager is hiding a superb racing ship in his workshop. In fact, his boss is even a very talented driver, who has won many races in the past! But he seems to keep an even heavier secret…
